items.titolo: This 75-inch Insignia QLED TV just dropped to less than $500 at Best Buy
items.descrizione: Looking to upgrade your home theater on a tight budget? Right now during Best Buy's Presidents' Day sale, you can save $250 on the 75-inch Insignia QF Series QLED TV which brings the price to just $400.

items.titolo: This 85-inch Sony Bravia TV dropped to less than $1,000 at Amazon - and I can vouch for it
items.descrizione: The Sony Bravia 3 may be a base model LED TV, but it still offers plenty of premium-grade features. Amazon is selling an 85-inch version for just under $1,000.

items.titolo: This 55-inch Fire TV is just $180 on Amazon right now
items.descrizione: Looking to upgrade or replace your TV? Budget shoppers should highly consider the 55-inch Insignia F50 for just $180.

items.titolo: Acer and Asus halt PC and laptop sales in Germany amid H.264 codec patent dispute — Nokia wins patent ruling, forcing tech giants to license HEVC codec
items.descrizione: Acer's and Asus's use of HEVC on their laptops and desktop PCs is allegedly infringing on Nokia's patent. Because of this, a German court ruled that they cannot sell their products in Germany until the matter is settled.

items.titolo: Disney: pagamento milionario per violazione della privacy

items.titolo: Enthusiast scores watercooled dual Nvidia GTX Titan X GPUs for $86 — $1,000 older flagship graphics card with custom water cooling for a bargain
items.descrizione: These dual Nvidia GTX Titan X GPUs in SLI are a solid upgrade for the user's current GTX 1650 GPU, provided they can make it work.

items.titolo: Intel fined $3 million by India’s antitrust regulator over discriminatory CPU warranty policy — says Intel abused its dominant position in the boxed processor market.
items.descrizione: Following a complaint filed in 2016, the Competition Commission of India concluded that Intel’s India-only warranty rules were discriminatory compared to policies in other countries.

items.titolo: In a blind test, audiophiles couldn't tell the difference between audio signals sent through copper wire, a banana, or wet mud — 'The mud should sound perfectly awful, but it doesn't,' notes the experiment creator
items.descrizione: An experiment revealed that people cannot differentiate between audio signals sent through premium audio cables, wet mud, and a banana.

items.descrizione: WhatsApp ripensa la posizione degli stati nell'interfaccia, spostandoli nella barra superiore delle chat. La funzione è ancora in fase di sviluppo. The post WhatsApp sposta gli stati in cima alla chat, ecco la novità app

items.titolo: ENIAC, the world’s first general-purpose digital computer, turns 80 years old today — legendary hulking machine was 1,000x faster than its nearest rival
items.descrizione: The Electronic Numerical Integrator and Computer (ENIAC) was unveiled to the public today in 1946.
